Question3

`.Machine$double.xmax`
$$0\ \ 11111111110\ \ 1111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111_{2}$$

`.Machine$double.xmin`
$$0\ \ 00000000001\ \ 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000_{2}$$

`.Machine$double.eps`
